description: current nova ipam calls FlatManager's create_networks and that doesn't allow overlapping prefix. Shouldn't we fix that as well?
title: QuantumManager fails when overlapping cidr networks are created

comments.content: current nova ipam calls FlatManager's create_networks and that doesn't allow overlapping prefix. Shouldn't we fix that as well?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tomoe

comments.content:
hi Sean,

ttx says that quantum-related bugs that would require Nova code changes (as is the case with this one) should stay tracked in nova.

thankfully, this issue is invalid, so we can just close it. 

Quantum will support overlapping IPs when we moved to the v2 API.  The version of quantum used here uses Nova's internal IPAM, which does not support overlapping IPs.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~danwent

comments.content: This is unsupported for essex per Dan's comments
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
